member.name: P:Argotic.Common.SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.AutoDetectExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if auto-detection of supported syndication extensions is enabled.
member.value: true if the syndication extensions supported by the load operation are automatically determined based on the XML namespaces declared on a syndication resource; otherwise false. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Automatic detection of supported syndication extensions will not remove any syndication extensions already added to the collection prior to the load operation execution.

member.name: P:Argotic.Common.SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.CharacterEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the character encoding to use when parsing a syndication resource.
member.value: A object that indicates the character encoding to use when parsing a syndication resource. The default value is .
member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Argotic.Common.SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.RetrievalLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of resource entities to retrieve from a syndication resource.
member.value: The maximum number of entities to retrieve from a syndication resource. The default value is 0, which indicates there is no limit.
member.remarks: This setting is typically used to optimize processing by reducing the number of resource entities that must be parsed. Some syndication resources may not utilize this setting if they do not represent a list of retrievable entities.
member.exception: The is less than zero.

member.name: P:Argotic.Common.SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets the syndication extensions to attempt to load from a syndication resource.
member.value: A collection of objects that represent syndication extension instances to attempt to instantiate during the load operation. The default value is an empty collection.
member.remarks: If is true, this collection will be automatically filled during the load operation based on the XML namespaces declared on the syndication resource. Automatic detection will not remove any syndication extensions already added to this collection prior to the load operation execution.

member.name: P:Argotic.Common.SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the amount of time after which asynchronous load operations will time out.
member.value: An that specifies the time-out period. The default value is 15 seconds.
member.exception: The time-out period is less than zero.
The time-out period is greater than a year.

member.name: M:Argotic.Common.ISyndicationResource.LoadAsyncCancel
member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous operation to load the syndication resource.
member.remarks: Use the LoadAsyncCancel method to cancel a pending operation. If there is a load operation in progress, this method releases resources used to execute the load operation. If there is no load operation pending, this method does nothing.

member.name: M:Argotic.Common.SyndicationDiscoveryUtility.ExtractPingbackNotificationServer(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts a that represents a pingback auto-discovery link from the supplied HTML markup.
member.param: The HTML markup to parse.
member.returns: A that represents the pingback auto-discovery link extracted from the . If no pingback auto-discovery link was found, returns null.

remarks.para: Pingback enabled resources that utilize the link mechanism will contain a <link rel="pingback" href="{Absolute URI of the pingback XML-RPC server}" /> element.

The that is returned will have an Href property that points to the absolute URI of the pingback XML-RPC server, and a rel attribute of pingback. The Title property and type attribute will also be extracted if available.
See http://www.hixie.ch/specs/pingback/pingback for more information about the pingback notification mechanism.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The is an empty string.

member.name: M:Argotic.Common.SyndicationDiscoveryUtility.IsPingbackEnabled(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the supplied is a pingback enabled web resource.
member.param: The to validate.
member.returns: true if the is pingback enabled, otherwise false.

remarks.para: There are two mechanisms used when determining if a web resource is pingback enabled; the presence of an HTML/XHTML <link> element with a rel attribute value of pingback or an HTTP header named X-Pingback. A web resource is considered pingback enabled if it utilizes either or both of these mechanisms.

To conform to the Pingback 1.0 specification, the following information should apply to a pingback enabled resource:
Pingback enabled resources that utilize the link mechanism will contain a <link rel="pingback" href="{Absolute URI of the pingback XML-RPC server}" /> element.
Pingback enabled resources that utilize the HTTP header mechanism will contain an HTTP header named X-Pingback whose value is the absolute URI of the pingback XML-RPC server.
This method is optimized to determine pingback enablement by examining the HTTP headers before attempting to parse the response data for an pingback XML-RPC server link.
See http://www.hixie.ch/specs/pingback/pingback for more information about the pingback notification mechanism.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Argotic.Common.SyndicationDiscoveryUtility.IsTrackbackEnabled(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the supplied is a trackback enabled web resource.
member.param: The to validate.
member.returns: true if the is trackback enabled, otherwise false.

remarks.para: The auto-discovery mechanism for trackback utilizes embedded RDF meta-data elements within the web resource.

To conform to the Trackback 1.2 specification, the following information should apply to a trackback enabled resource:
Trackback enabled resources will contain one or more embedded RDF elements that describe where to send pings for web log entries.
A sample embedded RDF element looks like this:
<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:trackback="http://madskills.com/public/xml/rss/module/trackback/"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://www.foo.com/archive.html#foo" dc:identifier="http://www.foo.com/archive.html#foo" dc:title="Foo Bar" trackback:ping="http://www.foo.com/tb.cgi/5" /> </rdf:RDF>
See http://www.sixapart.com/pronet/docs/trackback_spec for further information about the auto-discovery of Trackback ping URLs.

member.exception: The is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
